nodes.text: Darth Skrye was a female Sith Lord who held the title of Darth. In 82 BBY, the Jedi Padawan Dooku heard the voice of Darth Skrye during a Force vision that he experienced after encountering the Presagers of Hakotei on Asusto. In the vision, Skrye claimed that the Sith were reborn, and activated the Cauldron superweapon, causing a planet to be torn apart. Skrye shared her name with the artifact known as the Hand of Skrye.

Darth Skrye first appeared, as a voice heard in a vision, in the 2019 audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott. While Skrye was not identified in the audiobook, her name was given in the script release. As Skrye appears only within a vision, it is never confirmed whether she is a real character. According to Scott, Darth Skrye was a creation of fellow author Claudia Gray.
